Package layers

Interface Layer<T>

Type Parameters:
T - This generic is the type for the inputs passed through this layer.
All Known Subinterfaces:
OutputLayer<T,​O>
All Known Implementing Classes:
HiddenLayer, HighestOutputLayer, InputLayer, RoundedOutputLayer
public interface Layer<T>
This interface will be the individual computational layers for the Neural Network.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Object calc​(T input)
    This method will return output of the layer after computational of the input.
    Layer<T> clone()
    This will generate a deep clone of this layer.
    java.util.ArrayList<Node> getNodes()
    This will return the list of nodes used in the computation by this layer.
    void setNodes​(java.util.ArrayList<Node> nodes)
    This method will replace the current list of nodes with the one provided.

  • Method Details

    • calc

      java.lang.Object calc​(T input)
      This method will return output of the layer after computational of the input.
      Parameters:
      input - This parameter will be the input provided for computation.
      Returns:
      Expected out after computation.

    • getNodes

      java.util.ArrayList<Node> getNodes()
      This will return the list of nodes used in the computation by this layer.
      Returns:
      List of Nodes

    • clone

      Layer<T> clone()
      This will generate a deep clone of this layer.
      Returns:
      Layer

    • setNodes

      void setNodes​(java.util.ArrayList<Node> nodes)
      This method will replace the current list of nodes with the one provided.
      Parameters:
      nodes - This parameter is the list of nodes to replace with.
